attributes.action: Make it Law that we can sue the Unions (RMT,Aslef) Ect...
attributes.additional_details: Only doing this will see an end to the striking and get our train services back running again.
attributes.background: As everyone is fully aware with the constant striking from RMT especially this needs to happen because its gone on far too long now and need to hit them where it hurts their own pockets for loss of earnings and redundancy pay.
